context: Physics is the natural science that studies matter, its motion and behavior through space and time, and the related entities of energy and force. It is a fundamental science that aims to understand how the universe behaves. Classical mechanics, electromagnetism, thermodynamics, quantum mechanics, and relativity are some of the major branches of physics.
